blogPost.excerpt: DogeHouse is an open-source audio chat on the web. No more begging for invitations. Works across all platforms. Powered by Doge 🐶
blogPost.body: DogeHouse is an open-source audio chat on the web. No more begging for invitations. Works across all platforms. Powered by Doge 🐶
blogPost.title: DogeHouse - Open-source audio chat on the web.
blogPost.author: Nimrod Kramer

localize.description: DogeHouse是一个开源的网络音频聊天。不再需要乞求邀请。适用于所有平台。Powered by Doge🐶
localize.tagline: 网络上开源的音频聊天。

localize.description: DogeHouse是一個開源的網絡音頻聊天。不再需要乞求邀請。適用於所有平臺。Powered by Doge🐶
localize.tagline: 網絡上開源的音頻聊天。

previous.excerpt: Looking at a pile of domain renewals again? Bye Bye Domain is a marketplace to find a buyer for your domains before they expire. We list quality domains for low prices.
previous.title: Bye Bye Domain - Buy and sell domains before they expire

localize.description: 又在看一堆域名续费？Bye Bye Domain是一个市场，可以在你的域名到期前为你的域名找到买家。我们以低价列出优质域名。
localize.tagline: 在过期前购买和出售域名

localize.description: 又在看一堆域名續費？Bye Bye Domain是一個市場，可以在你的域名到期前爲你的域名找到買家。我們以低價列出優質域名。
localize.tagline: 在過期前購買和出售域名

next.excerpt: Business Banking APIs empower any aggregator, platform, neobank, or marketplace to easily perform banking functions on top of their existing corporate accounts or enable the same for their customers in India.
next.title: Business Banking APIs by Decentro - Perform banking functions on top of corporate accounts

localize.description: 商业银行API使任何聚合商、平台、新银行或市场能够在其现有的企业账户之上轻松地执行银行功能，或为其印度客户实现同样的功能。
localize.tagline: 履行公司账户之上的银行职能

localize.description: 商業銀行API使任何聚合商、平臺、新銀行或市場能夠在其現有的企業賬戶之上輕鬆地執行銀行功能，或爲其印度客戶實現同樣的功能。
localize.tagline: 履行公司賬戶之上的銀行職能
